name: CSUMB 205 - Image Class
tagline: A wrapper class for PIL's Image class for academic purposes
body:
CSUMB's CST205 - A simple Image Class
=======================

This project offers students acces to a simple RGBImage class, which
is built on the use of the Image module in the PIL package. As PIL is no
longer updated for Python 3, this package relies on Pillow.

This package will assume that the user is using at least Python 3.4


You can download this package through the use of PIP. Make sure that you have "pip" installed (comes with an install of Python 3.4.2), and from the command line, run
***
`pip install CSUMB205-Image`
***

On Mac OSX, you will have multiple versions of Python. You still need to install Python 3.4.2, but when you run pip, you must use
***
`pip3 install CSUMB205-Image`
***

The Python Package Index page for this package can be [found here](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/CSUMB205-Image).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
